Message Passing

Message Commands


The following command are passed to the selected processors.

The Message command has splitted in to 5 parts

  • Message commands
  • argument 1
  • argument 2
  • argument 3
  • argument 4

Total length of the message command with arguments is 48. Each and every argument length is 8

  • Message     -  16 character length
  • argument 1  -  8 character length
  • argument 2  -  8 character length
  • argument 3  -  8 character length
  • argument 4  -  8 character length

    • Command Summary

      Command
      Arguments
      Optional
      Max Arguments
      Result
      Processor
      Description
      memget Memory Address
      No
      1
      Value at given address
      Dsp
      		 This retrives the value of given address             

      Ex: memget 0xA0000000              Result : 0x12345678
      memset Memory Address      Memory Value
      No
      2
      0/1
      Dsp
      		 The given value is set to the given address       

      Ex: memset 0xA0000000      0x12345678              Result : 1
      temp1 Nil
      No
      0
      temperature value
      P2020
      		 This returns the temperature1 value      

      Ex: temp1      Result : 46
      temp2 Nil
      No
      0
      temperature value
      P2020
      		 This returns the temperature2 value      

      Ex: temp2      Result : 46
      temp3 Nil
      No
      0
      temperature value
      P2020
      		 This returns the temperature3 value      

      Ex: temp3      Result : 46
      Result
                  0 - Failure
                  1- Success

  • Detail

    Property Description
    Command Command passing to the processor
    arguments What arguments passing
    optional if arguments are optional or not
    Max arguments Maximum number of arguments allowed
    processor The command belongs to which processor
    Description Brief of the command and an example
    Result Return value of the corresponding command.If any set commands it will return 0 or 1
    1 - Success
    0 - Failure
